bdi4jade.goal

Interface GoalTemplate


  • public interface GoalTemplate
    This interface defines methods to create goal templates. Goal templates allow to specify groups of goals. A goals is in a group when it matches the specification of a template. This can be used to is used to indicate the set of goals that a plan is able to handle, for example.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean match(Goal goal)
      This methods checks if the given goal matches this template.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        boolean match(Goal goal)
        This methods checks if the given goal matches this template.
        Parameters:
        goal - the goal to be checked.
        Returns:
        true if the goal matches this template, false otherwise.
